page.title: 05WHAT DOES A VICAR DO?
page.content:
Mr Driver is the 10th vicar of the parish of{St Philip & St James,Tow Law
The vicar's job is hard work:- {"You have to sit & listen to people & {help people with all their problems.My {day usually begins at 7.00am with {prayers & bible reading.Quite often {I am finishing my work with prayers {after 11.00pm." { Mr Driver spends a lot of his time visiting people in their homes as well as preparing for the church services. There is a lot of writing involved in his job.Forms have to be filled in for the diocese and for the church commissioners.{ { Since Mr Driver came here in 1982,he has had 33 funerals,31 christenings and 13 weddings in the church.
